Posts.Content: cc01 wrote: Has anyone been allowed to stay on their vitamins. I plan to stay on all mine through chemo. I know my body will need them so I am taking them. Posts.Content: Feb 20, 2008 06:36AM cc01 wrote: I have been using the "It Stays" roll-on adhesive all along my hairline wear the tape tab is and it seems to work great and washes off with water so it won't pull on any hair you have like tape can. Has anyone else tried it? http://www.headcovers.com/174/it-stays-wig-adhesive/
